column4: making a  livecd based on ubuntu karmik, keep getting a popup on boot up stating "gvfsd-metadata closed unexpectedly".  Any ideas or suggestions incredibly appreciated.
It's hard for anyone to help because we don't know what changes you've made.
any idea where "ubuntu customization kit" might have some irc support?
sorry but no, never hard of it
Try the forums, people there can help
I wonder how many would have recognized it without the movie apollo 13. (I've actually got one of  Lovell's autographs)
Do you really? Lucky. I'm headed to the cape this July for the second to last shuttle launch, very excited.
excellent...last time I was down there was for glenn's return.
you should meet a friend of mine.  He has autographs and mission patches from every known US space launch crew.
if you're into that sort of memorabilia thing hang on and i'll private message you something after i find it...
hope that didn't overload your system
